title: Zoho Projects
description:
Zoho Projects is an online project management tool that helps teams collaborate effectively and complete projects on time. One of its core capabilities is issue tracking, which allows teams to quickly identify, prioritise, and resolve problems that arise during the project lifecycle.

Users can easily create and assign issues, set due dates, and track progress in real time. The tool also provides detailed analytics to help team leaders identify bottlenecks and take corrective actions.
